org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.ResponseHandler

Packages that use ResponseHandler
org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1   
 

Uses of ResponseHandler in org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
 

Classes in org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1 that implement ResponseHandler
 class FileResponseHandler<T>
          Implementation of ResponseHandler responsible for retrieving the contents of a file from the method response, writing to the local filesystem, and returning a status response of a given type
 class XmlResponseHandler<T>
          Implementation of ResponseHandler that uses JAXB to convert a method response body from XML to a java response object of a specified type
